title: Men Of “Valor”, Die Hard Is Anti-Capitalist 12.21.20
itunes:title: Men Of “Valor”, Die Hard Is Anti-Capitalist 12.21.20
description:
In episode 783, Jack and Miles are joined by Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend's Alison Rosen to discuss a Trump appointee demanding herd immunity, Dan Crenshaw smearing a veteran who reported sexual abuse, the Mission Impossible set being shut down, an explanation of Die Hard politics, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. ‘We want them infected’: Trump appointee demanded ‘herd immunity’ strategy, emails reveal
  2. ‘Like a Hand Grasping’: Trump Appointees Describe the Crushing of the C.D.C.
  3. Political Appointees Meddled in C.D.C.’s ‘Holiest of the Holy’ Health Reports
  4. VA Opts Against Charges in Alleged DC VAMC Assault of Congressional Staffer
  5. VA Secretary Focused on Smearing Woman Who Said She Was Sexually Assaulted in a VA Hospital, Probe Finds
  6. TOM CRUISE 'MISSION' MASK NOT UP TO SNUFF ... CDC Warned Against These
  7. John McTiernan's Explanation of 'Die Hard' as a Christmas Film Is a Lot to Unpack
  8. 7 Films With Symbolism You Didn't Notice (And Can't Unsee)
  9. WATCH: Dirty Art Club - Plastic Drip

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
